item.title: Predicting homopolymer and copolymer solubility through machine learning
item.description:
Christopher D. Stubbs, Yeonjoon Kim, Ethan C. Quinn, Raúl Pérez‐Soto, Eugene Y.‐X. Chen, Seonah Kim, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4405714714
Polymer solubility has applications in many important and diverse fields, including microprocessor fabrication, environmental conservation, paint formulation, and drug delivery, but it remains under-explored compared to its relative importance. This...
item.author: Christopher D. Stubbs, Yeonjoon Kim, Ethan C. Quinn, Raúl Pérez‐Soto, Eugene Y.‐X. Chen, Seonah Kim
